tool.name: map reads to reference
tool.description: Script for performing assignment of reads against a reference database
tool.command:
map_reads_to_reference.py -i $input_seqs_filepath -r $refseqs_fp #if str($assignment_method) != 'None': -m $assignment_method #end if
#if str($observation_metadata_fp) != 'None': -t $observation_metadata_fp #end if -o map_reads_to_reference_output #if $evalue: -e $evalue #end if
#if $min_percent_id: -s $min_percent_id #end if
#if $max_diff: --max_diff=$max_diff #end if
#if $queryalnfract: --queryalnfract=$queryalnfract #end if
#if $targetalnfract: --targetalnfract=$targetalnfract #end if
#if $max_accepts: --max_accepts=$max_accepts #end if
#if $max_rejects: --max_rejects=$max_rejects #end if ; compress_path.py -i map_reads_to_reference_output -o $output_dir

param.label: -r/--refseqs_fp: Path to reference sequences to search against [default: None]
param.name: refseqs_fp

param.label: -m/--assignment_method: Method for picking OTUs. Valid choices are: bwa-short, usearch, bwa-sw, blat, blat-nt. [default: usearch]
param.name: assignment_method

param.label: -t/--observation_metadata_fp: Path to observation metadata (e.g., taxonomy, EC, etc) [default: None]
param.name: observation_metadata_fp

param.label: -e/--evalue: Max e-value to consider a match [default: 1e-10]
param.name: evalue

param.label: -s/--min_percent_id: Min percent id to consider a match [default: 0.75]
param.name: min_percent_id

param.label: --max_diff: maxDiff to consider a match (applicable for -m bwa-short) -- see the aln section of "man bwa" for details [default (defined by bwa): 0.04]
param.name: max_diff

param.label: --queryalnfract: Min percent of the query seq that must match to consider a match (usearch only) [default: 0.35]
param.name: queryalnfract

param.label: --targetalnfract: Min percent of the target/reference seq that must match to consider a match (usearch only) [default: 0.0]
param.name: targetalnfract
